amendment.description: Amendment sought to require mortgage lenders and services participating in the HAMP program to continue to publicly report basic loan modification information.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part A of House Report 112-34 to require mortgage lenders and services participating in the HAMP program to continue to publicly report basic loan modification information.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Matsui amendment (A007) Failed by voice vote.
